Methanol.Description: Methanol can be produced from carbon dioxide through various processes such as carbon dioxide hydrogenation.
Methanol can be produced from hydrogen gas through catalytic processes like steam reforming or partial oxidation.
Methanol is an important intermediate in the production of formaldehyde, which is used in various industries.
